121976.「ねえ……ホントに頼むよ チキ坊。\n 母さんを探すために チカラを貸してほしい:
Hey... really, please, Chickibo. I need your
help to find my mom.

121977.「お願い！ この通りだから！: Please! Because it's just like this!

121979.「はあぁぁ……。そうだよね……。\n お前って そういうやつだよね……。: Haaaaaa... right... you're that kind of guy...

121980.「ソーン。チキ坊は……\n ご機嫌ナナメみたいですね。: Thorn. Chickibo...seems to be in a good mood.

121981.「いや……母さんが 大変なんだ。\n そんなこと 言ってられないよ。\n もう一:
No... my mom is in trouble. I can't say that.
I'll try again...!

121982.「……善き風向きは 猛き雄鶏だけが知る。\n おお 真白き風見鶏よ。\n 風上か:
Only the fierce rooster knows which way the
wind is blowing. O white weathercock! From
windward to leeward, make a bond...

121983.「枯れ木に 花を 咲かせましょう！\n ニワトリには エサを あげましょう～～っ:
Let the Dead Tree bloom! Let's feed the
Chicken!

121985.「あれは……北の方角でしょうか？: Is that... is that the direction to the north?

121986.「う うん。あそこまで行くと そうとう北……\n ドワチャッカ大陸や レンダーシ:
Ummm... If you go that far north, you'll cross
the Dwachakka Continent, Lendersia, and maybe
even Eltona Continent...

121987.「とはいえ 探す範囲が広すぎるし\n アテにならないよね。ごめんよ……\n 全然:
but the area I'm looking for is too wide and I
can't rely on it. Sorry... not at all
helpful... haha...

121989.「あ……もしかして エゼルも占ってたの？: Oh...did Ezell divine it too, by any chance?

121990.「もちろんよ。いくら 当たらないからって\n 母さんの 一大事なんだし\n そん:
Of course. I can't say that I'm pathetic just
because it won't hit me, because it's a big
deal for Mom.

121991.「でも……全然ダメ！ いくら占っても同じよ。\n ぼんやりしたイメージしか 見え:
But... not at all! No matter how much I read,
it's the same. I can only see a vague image.

121992.「すご～く陰気で 荒れ果てた場所……\n 黒くて 大きくて 不気味な影が\n す:
It's a very gloomy, desolate place... a big,
black, eerie shadow looms very close...

121993.「陰気で不気味っていうと……魔瘴とか？\n でも それ以上のことは わからないわ:
By gloomy and creepy, you mean... demon miasma or something like that? But beyond that, I don't know. I'm sorry, Juno. I'm not much
help...

121994.「いやいや それを言うなら 僕の方が\n ずっと 役立たずだから……。:
No, no, no. I'm much more useless than you
are...

121995.「ううん。あたしの方が\n ずっとずっと 役立たずだもん……。:
No. I'm much more useless than you. I'm much,
much more useless than you...

121996.「……いいえ。そんなことありません！\n ふたりの占いを合わせれば 母さんを\n:
...No. No, that's not true! If we both do our
readings together, we might be able to find
your mother.

121998.「ここから北の 陰気で荒れ果てた地にある\n 黒くて 大きくて 不気味な影の近く:
Do you have any idea where in the gloomy,
desolate lands north of here, near the black,
large, eerie shadows... anywhere?

121999.「ふたりの占いを 手がかりにすれば きっと\n 母さんの居場所を 突き止められる:
I'm sure that if we use our horoscopes as
clues, we can locate Mom. Let's split up and
look for her.

122000.「……何か 胸騒ぎがするのです。\n よくないことが 母さんに起きている気がして:
Something is bothering me. Something bad is
happening to my mother. Let's hurry before
it's too late!

122002.「ソーンとエゼルの占いから 導き出された場所。\n 私も 大きな黒い影は 暗黒大:
This place was derived from Thorn and Ezell's divination. I, too, came here thinking that the great black shadow was the Dark Tree,
but...

122004.「ここを突き止めるなんて 本当に優秀な子たち。\n 母さん 鼻が高いわ♪ ふふっ:
They're really good kids to figure this place
out. Mother, your nose is so high. ♪ Phew!

122005.「母さん。あなたは 何をしているんですか？ \n いったい 何を 始めるつもりな:
Mother. What are you doing? What on earth do
you intend to start? Tell me... everything!

122006.「あら。見ればわかるでしょう？\n ピュアパールのチカラで みんなのハートを\n:
Oops. You can tell by looking at it, can't
you? I'm trying to revolutionize everyone's
heart with the power of pure pearl<heart>

122007.「人の心が生み出す 強力な精神エネルギー\n ピュアパール。そして それを採取す:
Pure pearl, a powerful spiritual energy produced by the human mind. And the fortune teller's secret art of harvesting it, Arcana
Serapia...

122008.「この術を使えるのは 才能ある占い師だけ。\n 感謝してるわよ ユノ <cs_p:
Only a talented fortune teller can use this technique. I appreciate it, Juno . Thank you so much for
retrieving the pure pearl... ♪

122009.「あなたたちの集めた ピュアパールから作った\n この 巨大ピュアパールさえあれ:
If only I had this giant pure pearl made from
the pure pearls you have collected, I could
control people's hearts and minds as I wish.

122010.「私たちに アルカナ・セラピアを教えたのは\n これを 完成させるためだったんで:
Was it to perfect this that you taught us
Arcana Serapia...?

122011.「そんなに ショックを受けるようなことかしら？\n ……アタシが 今まで どれだ:
Is this really such a shock to you? You know
how many troubled people I've read up on?

122012.「毎日 どんなに占っても ひとりひとりの悩みを\n どれだけ解決してあげても 世:
No matter how many divinations I read each day, no matter how many of each person's problems I solve, all the suffering in the
world will never disappear...

122013.「人の心から 悩み苦しみを 消し去るには？\n 真の意味で 人々を救うには どう:
How do you make people's worries and suffering disappear from their minds? How can I truly help people? I thought about it and finally I
realized.

122014.「悩める心 そのものを 消し去ればいい！\n 人の心を支配して 統一する……。\:
I want to wipe out the mind that worries you!
To control and unify the human mind... mix,
blend, and unite it all.

122015.「世の中から 悩める人々を 一掃しちゃう\n もっともイージーで ハッピーな方法:
It's the easiest, happiest way to rid the
world of all the people who bother you, isn't
it? What do you think? This genius theory

122016.「……確かに 母さんは いつも言っていました。\n 占い師の 究極の目的とは 悩:
Indeed, my mother always said that the
ultimate goal of a fortune teller is to rid
the world of all afflicted people.

122017.「あなたの志を尊敬しています。\n あなたの夢は 私の夢です……。\n 今までも:
I respect your aspirations. Your dreams are my
dreams... always have been and always will be.

122018.「でも……！ 人の心を 踏みにじるような\n こんなやり方は 間違っています！\:
But...! This is not the way to trample on
people's hearts! I beg you, please wake up!

122019.「あらやだ……アタシは いたって正気よ？\n それに 間違ってるとか 間違ってな:
Oh, no... I'm perfectly sane, you know. And
you don't have to worry about whether I'm
wrong or not anymore.

122020.「この先の未来に もはや 人の意思というものは\n 存在しなくなるの。悩み苦しみ:
In the future, human will will no longer exist. We will be free from worry and pain, and the Dark Mind will disappear without a
trace.

122021.「ねえ <cs_pchero>……。\n 悩みがなくなるって ステキなことよね♪:
Hey <cs_pchero>... it's a wonderful thing to
be free of worries... don't you think so too?<yesno><close>

122022.「やっぱり そうよね！ あなたなら\n わかってくれるって 信じてたわ～♪:
I knew it! I knew it! I knew you would
understand!

122023.「あら 残念……。でも いいわ。\n あなたも すぐに 大賛成してくれるはずよ♪:
Oh, that's too bad... but okay. I'm sure
you'll be all for it in no time.

122024.「さあ 理想の世界を築きましょ……？\n まずは <cs_pchero>！ あな:
Let's build our ideal world...? First, ! I'll rule over all of them, down to the depths of your heart... and save
you!

122027.「なぜなの……？\n 確かに <cs_pchero>の心に 接続しているのに\n:
Why is that...? Surely it's connected to
<cs_pchero> mind, so why can't it rule!

122028.「私なんて たった ひと粒のピュアパールで\n 心を 支配されてしまったのに……:
I've had my heart controlled by a single pure
pearl...

122029.「どうして受け入れないの！\n あなたの中に 迷いはないというの？\n 思いだし:
Why don't you accept it! Are you sure there is
no hesitation in you? Try to remember...!

122030.「キズつくのを怖れ 勇気を見失い……\n 夢を追うことに疲れ 希望を見失い……\:
We lose courage because we're afraid of getting hurt... we lose hope because we're tired of chasing dreams... we lose sight of
what's important because we envy others...!

122031.「人は 弱い生き物なのよ。\n 常に思い悩み 闇の淵で あえぎ続ける……。\n:
We are weak creatures. Always worrying and
groaning in the depths of darkness... You want
to be happy, don't you? You want to be saved!

122032.「なのに なぜ……。なぜ あなたは……。\n ぐっ……ううっ ううううっ……！: So why... why are you... ugh... ugh...!

122033.「この 苦しみ方……。\n 今までに アルカナ・セラピアで占ってきた\n みなさ:
This way of suffering is very similar to
everyone I have read at Arcana Serapia...!

122034.「……もしかして 母さん。\n あなたの心の中には 迷いが……？\n 隠された真:
Perhaps, Mother. Is there something lost in
your mind? A hidden truth... in the Dark
Mind...?

122035.「今の あなたは ピュアパールを通して\n 母さんの心と つながっている状態です:
You are now Connected Heart through Pure
Pearl. Conversely, you will be able to enter
into your mother's heart.

122036.「どうか お願いです。占い師として……\n 母さんを 救ってあげてください！:
Please, I beg you. As a fortune teller...
please save my mother!

122037.「ギギギッ……おのれの心に 侵入を許すとは。\n マルグリットめ。この期におよん:
Giggidy...you have allowed your heart to be
invaded. Margaret. How could you be so stupid
at this stage of your life?

122038.「我は この女の心の闇から 生まれた\n もうひとつの 意思……。:
I am another will born from the Dark Mind of
this woman.

122039.「迷いのある この女に成り代わり\n 我が意のままに事を進め すべての心を\n:
I was going to take the place of this lost
woman and do as I pleased, to rule all hearts
and minds...

122040.「よかろう。まずは 貴様の心を絡め取り\n 深い闇の底へと 沈めてやろう！\n:
Very well. First, I will entangle your mind
and plunge you into the depths of the Dark
Mind! Gigigigigiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiii!

122042.「今なら ピュアパールを通して\n 母さんの心の中にも 入れるはず。\n お願い:
Now you can enter my mother's heart through
Pure Pearl. Please, one more time...!

122044.「わ…我が 負けるだと……？\n 貴様らは 心の闇に囚われ 永遠に\n もがき続:
I'm losing? You are but weaklings, trapped in
the Dark Mind, forever struggling...

122045.「事実 この女は 弱かった！\n 悩み苦しみから逃れるため 次第に\n 心の闇に:
In fact, she was weak! In order to escape her
worries and suffering, she gradually gave
herself over to the Dark Mind...

122046.「なのに なぜだ！ なぜ貴様は闇に堕ちぬ！\n いったい 貴様の心は どうなって:
But why? ! Why have you not fallen into
darkness? What is going on in your mind?

122047.「ギギ……ギ……なんと……。\n 人の心に寄り添い続け 悩みと向き合うことで\n:
Gigi...gi...gi...gi...gi...gi...gi...gi...gi.. .gi...gi...gi... How can one grow into an unshakable soul by continuing to be close to
the heart and facing one's problems?

122048.「人の心は闇を生む。だが……\n 不屈の意志を宿すのも また 人の心か……。\n:
Dark Mind gives birth to Dark Mind. But it is
also the human heart that bears the unyielding
will. Farewell, mighty fortune teller.

122049.「母さん……。どうして こんなことを……？: Mother... why are you doing this?

122050.「……かつて お腹を痛めて 産んだ娘がいたの。\n 幼くして 病気で亡くしたわ…:
I had a daughter once, born with an upset
stomach. I lost her to illness at a very young
age...

122051.「アタシは あの子が死ぬという未来を\n 占いで知っていた。でも……死の運命から:
I knew from my horoscope that she was going to
die. But...I could not save her from her fate.

122052.「……占い師なんて 無力だわ。\n 我が子の命 ひとつ 助けられないのに。:
Fortune tellers are powerless. I can't even
save the life of my own child.

122053.「でもね……死の間際 あの子は言ったの。\n 占い師は すばらしい職業よ……って:
But...at the moment of her death, she said.
"Being a fortune teller is a wonderful
profession.

122054.「母さんみたいな 占い師になって\n 世界中のみんなが抱える 悩みや苦しみを\n:
I wanted to become a fortune teller like my
mother and eliminate all the troubles and
suffering that everyone in the world has...

122055.「それからのアタシは あの子が果たせなかった\n 夢をかなえるためだけに 生きた:
From then on, I lived my life only to fulfill the dream that she could not fulfill. Day after day, I faced the Dark Mind of the
counselor.

122056.「でも……むなしさだけが つのっていった。\n どんなに占っても 悩みを解決して:
But...only the feeling of emptiness grew. No matter how much you read, no matter how much you solve your problems, people continue to
suffer with new problems...

122057.「無力な自分を 責めた。そして 疲れ果てた。\n 危険で ゆがんだ思考に 思いを:
I blamed myself for being so helpless. And I was exhausted. Dangerous and distorted thoughts took over my thoughts, and
eventually... a monster was born in my heart.

122059.「ユノ……。アタシは 自分の目的のために\n あなたを利用してしまった。ごめんな:
Juno... I used you for my own purposes. I'm
sorry... it's really unforgivable...

122060.「違います 母さん……。\n 母さんが たったひとりで 悩んでいたことに\n 気:
No, Mother I'm sorry I couldn't see that you
were alone with your problems...

122061.「私も 占い師として さまざまな相談者の\n 心の闇と向き合ってきました。それぞ:
As a fortune teller, I have faced the Dark Mind of various clients. Each of them was troubled, but they were living their lives in
their own way.

122062.「人が 悩みを乗り越えようとする姿は 美しく\n 尊いものです。本気で悩むからこ:
It is beautiful and precious to see people trying to overcome their problems. I believe that it is only when people are truly troubled
that they become the people they are.

122063.「だからこそ 私たち 占い師が必要なんです。\n 占い師は 人々の悩みと向き合い:
That is why we fortune tellers are needed. Fortune tellers are in the business of facing people's problems and staying close to their
hearts.

122064.「それなのに 私は……\n 母さんだけは 平気だと思い込んで……。:
And yet, I... assumed that you were the only
one who was okay with it.

122066.「だから だから……母さんっ……。\n これからは あなたの悩みも 苦しみも\n:
That's why... mother... from now on, I want
you to talk to us about your problems and
sufferings. ...

122067.「もう……ひとりで がんばらないで……！: Don't try to do it alone.

122068.「あなたって子は……。\n いつの間にか アタシなんかより\n ずっと立派な 占:
You little girl... before I knew it, you'd
become a much better fortune teller than I
ever was.

122069.「<cs_pchero>……本当に 感謝しているわ。\n まっすぐ前を向く あな:
<cs_pchero>...I am truly grateful. Your
spirit of looking straight ahead saved me from
the depths of darkness.

122070.「あなたのような 強い心を持ちたい……。\n だから 初心に戻って ひとりひとり:
I want to have a strong heart like yours... so I'm going on a journey to go back to the beginning and face each and every one of my
concerns.

122072.「あの子の理想に恥じない 占い師になるために。\n そして……あなたたちの前に立:
To become a fortune teller worthy of her
ideals. And to become a human being who would
not be ashamed to stand in front of you.

122073.「でも……もしも くじけそうになったら\n みんなのところへ 帰って\n ひと休:
But... if I feel myself getting crushed, would
it be okay if I went back to you guys for a
break?

122074.「……もちろんです 母さん。\n いつまでも みんなで 待っています！:
...Of course, Mother. We'll all be waiting for
you forever!

122076.「<cs_pchero>さん……。\n 母さんを 助けてくださって\n 本当に:
<cs_pchero>... thank you so much for saving
my mom.

122077.「……もうひとつだけ お願いがあるのです。\n とても大事なお話なので できるだ:
I have one more favor to ask. It's very
important, so please come back to the Divine
House as soon as possible.

142651.「これじゃ ラチがあかないのよ……！: This is not going to end well.

142652.「人の心を 闇から救いだすのは\n やっぱり……人の心だと思うから。:
Because I believe that it is... the human
heart that rescues people from the Dark Mind.

143237.「誰だって ひとりで平気なはずがないのに……！: No one should have to be alone.
